name: PhilioInsight
0:
”Alexa, turn on the switch”
”Alexa, turn off the switch”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
By using Philio Insight you can control the dimmer value or turn on(off) the switch.

To control the Philio Insight with Alexa you need:
•  Get a Philio home gateway hardware and controllable device (switch or dimmer)
•  Download the Philio Insight App
•  Login with your Apple / Google Account
•  Go to Left Side Menu > Choice Home Management > Select Home > Click Setting Button (On the top right of screen) 
•  Enable Alexa Service
•  Download Amazon Alexa app from Amazon Market, Google Play or iOS App Store, and connect Echo with "Alexa" app
•  Search the Alexa Skills directory for "Philio Insight"
•  Click Enable skill of "Philio Insight", then login your Gmail Account
•  Discover devices in Alexa app
•  Say:
 "Alexa, turn on switch"
 "Alexa, turn on the dimmer"
 "Alexa, dim the lights"

For more Philio device information: https://www.zwavetaiwan.com.tw/products
